    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static TimelineOptions create()
        Default constructor.
        Returns:
        a new object instance

      • setAvoidOverlappingGridLinesl

        public final void setAvoidOverlappingGridLinesl(boolean avoidOverlappingGridLines)
        Whether display elements (e.g., the bars in a timeline) should obscure grid lines. If false, grid lines may be covered completely by display elements. If true, display elements may be altered to keep grid lines visible.
        Parameters:
        avoidOverlappingGridLines - default is true

      • setBackgroundColor

        public final void setBackgroundColor(BackgroundColor backgroundColor)
        The background color for the main area of the chart.
        Parameters:
        backgroundColor -

      • setBackgroundColor

        public final void setBackgroundColor(String backgroundColor)
        The background color for the main area of the chart.
        Parameters:
        backgroundColor - an HTML color string

      • setBarLabelStyle

        public final void setBarLabelStyle(TextStyle barLabelStyle)
        Specifies the bar label text style.
        Parameters:
        barLabelStyle -

      • setColorByRowLabel

        public final void setColorByRowLabel(boolean colorByRowLabel)
        If set to true, colors every bar on the row the same. The default is to use one color per bar label.
        Parameters:
        colorByRowLabel - default is false

      • setColors

        public final void setColors(String... colors)
        The colors to use for the chart lines and labels.
        Parameters:
        colors - an array where each element is a string in a valid HTML color format.

      • setEnableInteractivity

        public final void setEnableInteractivity(boolean enableInteractivity)
        Whether the chart throws user-based events or reacts to user interaction. If false, the chart will not throw 'select' or other interaction-based events (but will throw ready or error events), and will not display hovertext or otherwise change depending on user input.
        Parameters:
        enableInteractivity -

      • setForceIFrame

        public final void setForceIFrame(boolean forceIFrame)
        Draws the chart inside an inline frame. (Note that on IE8, this option is ignored; all IE8 charts are drawn in i-frames.)
        Parameters:
        forceIFrame - true for drawing inside an inline frame

      • setGroupByRowLabel

        public final void setGroupByRowLabel(boolean groupByRowLabel)
        If set to false, creates one row for every dataTable entry. The default is to collect bars with the same row label into one row.
        Parameters:
        groupByRowLabel - default is true

      • setRowLabelStyle

        public final void setRowLabelStyle(TextStyle rowLabelStyle)
        Specifies the row label text style.
        Parameters:
        rowLabelStyle -

      • setShowBarLabels

        public final void setShowBarLabels(boolean showBarLabels)
        If set to false, omits bar labels. The default is to show them.
        Parameters:
        showBarLabels - default is true

      • setShowRowLabels

        public final void setShowRowLabels(boolean showRowLabels)
        If set to false, omits row labels. The default is to show them.
        Parameters:
        showRowLabels - default is true

      • setSingleColor

        public final void setSingleColor(String singleColor)
        Colors all bars the same.
        Parameters:
        singleColor -
